en.title: [1Q 2025] International Investment Position
en.description: Quarterly international investment position, covering assets and liabilities by economic sector and country.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly international investment position data, covering assets and liabilities by economic sector and country. Overall, Malaysia's IIP recorded net assets of RM37.8 bil as at the end of 1Q (end-4Q 2024: net liabilities of RM11.7 bil).

bm.title: [ST1 2025] Kedudukan Pelaburan Antarabangsa
bm.description: Kedudukan pelaburan antarabangsa suku tahunan, merangkumi aset dan liabiliti mengikut sektor ekonomi dan negara.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data kedudukan pelaburan antarabangsa suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi aset dan liabiliti mengikut sektor ekonomi dan negara. Secara keseluruhan, IIP Malaysia mencatatkan aset bersih sebanyak RM37.8 bil pada akhir ST1 (akhir ST4 2024: liabiliti bersih RM11.7 bil).
